channel.title: Downgrade resolution on a PI Cleint
channel.description:
Hey guys. For some reason my home(edgeville) is very laggy. And i beleive it's all the grass that's around that's making it do that. And was woundering if someone new how to downgrade my client so the resolution isnt so high. My run.bat is
@echo off java -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 lowmem members 32 pause
But when i make it lowmemory. It still makes it lag. Any idea's mopar?

item.title: Downgrade resolution on a PI Cleint
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Hmm, then if it’s only Edgeville check if it is not full of objects/npc’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Downgrade resolution on a PI Cleint
